Largo.KEC38: KEC38 (sometimes referred to as Largo All Hazards) is a NOAA Weather Radio station that serves the Tampa Bay Area and surrounding cities as well as Tampa Bay and 40 miles into the Gulf of Mexico. It is programmed from the National Weather Service forecast office in Tampa, Florida with its transmitter located in the same city. It broadcasts weather and hazard information for the following Counties: Hillsborough, Manatee, Pasco, and Pinellas.
